channel.title: Ruix - The latest 459
channel.description:
Well, hello everyone.
Please, no flaming.
I'm Nexus_, the programmer of Ruix. I have been working on PJA Hyperion for the past 2 weeks. Since then, I have made alot of progress. I am trying to finish what the PJA team didn't, like firemaking, castle wars, dueling, fight pits, etc. All of these are to be done to the full 100%, nothing more, nothing less. Recently, I have made a development team that consists of:
[ul][li]Me, the main programmer.[/li] [li]Josh, the second-in-line programmer.[/li] [li]Ronald, the server sponsor.[/li] [li]Lukas, the forums programmer.[/li][/ul]
With this team, which was hard to find, I am to make this PJA source the best there is. So far, we are the most advanced PJA server. I am going to keep it that way.
[size=18pt]Features[/size] -Random events -Santa -Easter bunny -Mysterious old man -Pissed Ghost -Evil chicken -Tree spirit -Golem -Troll -Drunk Dwarf -Quests -Lost city remade, much more thourough -Cook's assistant finished -Vampire slayer finished -Dragon slayer finished -The Godfather finished -Mr. Raggity Bones finished -Desert treasure 60% finished
[size=18pt]Minigames[/size] -Fight pits done.
[size=18pt]Skills[/size] -Firemaking -Fixed no-clipping glitch. -All logs have a specific "turnToAsh();" timer. -Magic -Finished all spells for ancients. -Lookup stat spell working for lunar. -Runecrafting -Makes more runes if you have a high enough level -Construction -Finished butler -If not payed 1m a week, will not work for you, except swear at you. -Finished stairs, now there are 'floors' lol. -No more stacking houses on top of each other. -Finished boxing ring (respawns right in front of the boxing ring if dead).
[size=18pt]NPC Updates[/size] -More spawns, like full taverly dungeon and Kreegan House. -Killer Queen -Correct attack, block, and moving emotes. -Exact attack ratios and hits (magic, range, and attack) like RS. -When you kill the NPC, it turns into the next one. -Barrelchest -Correct attack, block, and moving emotes. -Throws the anchor at you. -Hits through magic.
[size=18pt]Player Updates[/size] -To be updated.
[size=18pt]PVP[/size] -Fixed clipped following with magic.
[size=18pt]PVN[/size] -Fixed NPC emotes, almost all of them were glitched attack, defence, and walk emotes.
[size=18pt]Pictures[/size] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/BarrageNEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Login.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Shops.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Wearing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Join.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Skills.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/NPC%20Updates/GhostIMB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/NPC%20Updates/SkillcapeIMB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/NPC%20Updates/SlayerMaster.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/NPC%20Updates/TalismanIMB.png[/img] I will finish this when I get home.

item.title: Ruix - The latest 459
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

marcbob:

looks good bro but explain why the one shop is called illegal tailsman?

Well, the theory is this:

There came a gang of Monk Brothers to Ruix from a different place. They sell illegal items that are ‘banned’ from the city of Varrock. So, its illegal.

Read full topic

@Nexus1 wrote:

Thanks, both of you. And yes, all skillcapes work 100%, glitch free.

item.title: Ruix - The latest 459
item.dc:creator: @HitThisCity HitThisCity
item.description:
@HitThisCity wrote:

I’m liking this development. Especially that RuneCrafting feature, and good job adding those quests hopefully you can fully finish Desert Treasure Quest. Also, do all the skillcapes have the proper emotes or is it just the strength skillcape? You should list those, skillcapes and which ones have the working animations.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruix - The latest 459
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Well, hello everyone.

Please, no flaming.

I’m Nexus_, the programmer of Ruix. I have been working on PJA Hyperion for the past 2 weeks. Since then, I have made alot of progress. I am trying to finish what the PJA team didn’t, like firemaking, castle wars, dueling, fight pits, etc. All of these are to be done to the full 100%, nothing more, nothing less. Recently, I have made a development team that consists of:

[ul][li]Me, the main programmer.[/li]
[li]Josh, the second-in-line programmer.[/li]
[li]Ronald, the server sponsor.[/li]
[li]Lukas, the forums programmer.[/li][/ul]

With this team, which was hard to find, I am to make this PJA source the best there is. So far, we are the most advanced PJA server. I am going to keep it that way.

[size=18pt]Features[/size]
-Random events
-Santa
-Easter bunny
-Mysterious old man
-Pissed Ghost
-Evil chicken
-Tree spirit
-Golem
-Troll
-Drunk Dwarf
-Quests
-Lost city remade, much more thourough
-Cook’s assistant finished
-Vampire slayer finished
-Dragon slayer finished
-The Godfather finished
-Mr. Raggity Bones finished
-Desert treasure 60% finished

[size=18pt]Minigames[/size]
-Fight pits done.

[size=18pt]Skills[/size]
-Firemaking
-Fixed no-clipping glitch.
-All logs have a specific “turnToAsh();” timer.
-Magic
-Finished all spells for ancients.
-Lookup stat spell working for lunar.
-Runecrafting
-Makes more runes if you have a high enough level
-Construction
-Finished butler
-If not payed 1m a week, will not work for you, except swear at you.
-Finished stairs, now there are ‘floors’ lol.
-No more stacking houses on top of each other.
-Finished boxing ring (respawns right in front of the boxing ring if dead).

[size=18pt]NPC Updates[/size]
-More spawns, like full taverly dungeon and Kreegan House.
-Killer Queen
-Correct attack, block, and moving emotes.
-Exact attack ratios and hits (magic, range, and attack) like RS.
-When you kill the NPC, it turns into the next one.
-Barrelchest
-Correct attack, block, and moving emotes.
-Throws the anchor at you.
-Hits through magic.

[size=18pt]Player Updates[/size]
-To be updated.

[size=18pt]PVP[/size]
-Fixed clipped following with magic.

[size=18pt]PVN[/size]
-Fixed NPC emotes, almost all of them were glitched attack, defence, and walk emotes.

[size=18pt]Pictures[/size]










I will finish this when I get home.

Read full topic
